CustomField.description: Initial Amount Billed Pre-Tax based on Selected Payment Term
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Upfront Payments"), Amount, IF( ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Annual"), MIN(Amount, Amount / License_Term__c * 12), IF( ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Semi-Annual"), MIN(Amount, Amount / License_Term__c * 6), IF( ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Quarterly"), MIN(Amount, Amount / License_Term__c * 3), IF( ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Monthly"), Amount / License_Term__c, Amount ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Initial Amount Billed Pre-Tax based on Selected Payment Term
CustomField.label: Initial Amount
